name: Poppy Bubble
description:
CONTROLS

Z to start the game (O on mobile)
X to float upward (X on mobile)

RULES

You are a soap bubble! Cacti are everywhere! Score points by flying through the gaps between the cacti. How long can you survive?

CREDITS

Code by SpaceCat and Aram J. French. Graphics and sound by Aram J. French.
